io.amcp.core

Interface Agent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAgent, SimpleAgent

    public interface Agent
extends Serializable
    Base interface for all agents in the AMCP system. Agents are autonomous computational entities that can process events, maintain state, and participate in the agent mesh communication. AMCP v1.5 enhances the Agent interface with: - Simplified convenience methods for common operations - Enhanced lifecycle callbacks with error handling - Built-in retry and resilience patterns - CloudEvents-aware event publishing - Multi-language compatibility preparations
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0
    Version:
    1.5.0 - Enhanced with simplified API and v1.5 features

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentId

        AgentID getAgentId()
        Gets the unique identifier for this agent. The ID persists across migrations and context changes.

      • getAgentType

        String getAgentType()
        Gets the agent type, which determines the agent's behavior and capabilities.

      • getLifecycleState

        AgentLifecycle getLifecycleState()
        Gets the current lifecycle state of this agent.

      • getAgentContext

        AgentContext getAgentContext()
        Gets the current agent context hosting this agent.

      • onCreate

        default void onCreate(Object initData)
        Called when the agent is first created. Override to perform initialization logic.
        Parameters:
        initData - optional initialization data

      • onActivate

        default void onActivate()
        Called when the agent is activated (becomes active). This happens after creation or when resuming from inactive state.

      • onDeactivate

        default void onDeactivate()
        Called when the agent is deactivated (becomes inactive). The agent should prepare for potential serialization/storage.

      • onBeforeClone

        default void onBeforeClone(AgentID cloneId)
        Called before the agent is cloned. The clone will have the same state but a different AgentID.
        Parameters:
        cloneId - the ID of the new clone

      • onAfterClone

        default void onAfterClone(Agent clone)
        Called after this agent has been cloned. This is called on the original agent, not the clone.
        Parameters:
        clone - the newly created clone

      • onBeforeDispatch

        default void onBeforeDispatch(String destinationContext)
        Called before the agent is dispatched (migrated) to another context. The agent should prepare its state for serialization.
        Parameters:
        destinationContext - the target context for migration

      • onArrival

        default void onArrival(String previousContext)
        Called after the agent has arrived at a new context (post-migration). The agent can perform any necessary reinitialization.
        Parameters:
        previousContext - the context the agent came from

      • onDestroy

        default void onDestroy()
        Called when the agent is about to be destroyed. Perform any necessary cleanup here.

      • handleEvent

        CompletableFuture<Void> handleEvent(Event event)
        Called when this agent receives an event. Override to implement custom event processing logic.
        Parameters:
        event - the received event
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when event processing is done

      • handleControlEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> handleControlEvent(ControlEvent controlEvent)
        Called when this agent receives a control event. Control events are system-level events for managing agent lifecycle.
        Parameters:
        controlEvent - the control event
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when control event processing is done

      • captureState

        default Object captureState()
        Gets the current state of the agent for serialization. Override if the agent has complex state that needs custom serialization.
        Returns:
        the agent's serializable state

      • restoreState

        default void restoreState(Object state)
        Restores the agent's state after deserialization. Override if the agent needs custom state restoration logic.
        Parameters:
        state - the previously captured state

      • publishEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishEvent(String topic,
                                             Object payload)
        Publishes an event to the specified topic.

      • publishEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishEvent(String topic,
                                             Object payload,
                                             DeliveryOptions options)
        Publishes an event with delivery options.

      • publishEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishEvent(Event event)
        Publishes a pre-built event.

      • subscribe

        default void subscribe(String topicPattern)
        Subscribes to a topic pattern.

      • unsubscribe

        default void unsubscribe(String topicPattern)
        Unsubscribes from a topic pattern.

      • publishEventAndWait

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishEventAndWait(String topic,
                                                    Object payload)
        Publishes an event and waits for acknowledgment (if delivery options require it).
        Parameters:
        topic - the event topic
        payload - the event payload
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when the event is published and acknowledged

      • broadcastEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> broadcastEvent(String eventType,
                                               Object payload)
        Broadcasts an event to all agents (uses wildcard topic).
        Parameters:
        eventType - the type of broadcast event
        payload - the event payload
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when the broadcast is sent

      • sendMessage

        default CompletableFuture<Void> sendMessage(AgentID targetAgentId,
                                            String messageType,
                                            Object payload)
        Sends a direct message to another agent by ID.
        Parameters:
        targetAgentId - the recipient agent ID
        messageType - the type of message
        payload - the message payload
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when the message is sent

      • publishCloudEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishCloudEvent(String topic,
                                                  Object payload,
                                                  String contentType)
        Publishes a CloudEvents-compliant event with content type specification.
        Parameters:
        topic - the event topic (CloudEvents 'type')
        payload - the event payload (CloudEvents 'data')
        contentType - the data content type (e.g., "application/json")
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when the event is published

      • publishJsonEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishJsonEvent(String topic,
                                                 Object payload)
        Publishes a JSON event (convenience method for JSON content).

      • publishTextEvent

        default CompletableFuture<Void> publishTextEvent(String topic,
                                                 String textPayload)
        Publishes a text event (convenience method for plain text content).

      • subscribeToAgent

        default void subscribeToAgent(AgentID sourceAgentId,
                              String eventPattern)
        Subscribes to events from a specific agent.
        Parameters:
        sourceAgentId - the agent to listen to
        eventPattern - optional event type pattern (null for all events)

      • subscribeToBroadcasts

        default void subscribeToBroadcasts(String eventType)
        Subscribes to broadcast events of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the broadcast event type to listen for

      • subscribeToAllBroadcasts

        default void subscribeToAllBroadcasts()
        Subscribes to all broadcast events.

      • onError

        default CompletableFuture<Void> onError(Event event,
                                        Throwable error)
        Called when an error occurs during event processing. Override to implement custom error handling logic.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that caused the error
        error - the exception that occurred
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when error handling is done

      • onEventProcessed

        default void onEventProcessed(Event event)
        Called when the agent successfully processes an event. Override to implement custom success handling (metrics, logging, etc.).
        Parameters:
        event - the event that was processed

      • onStateChange

        default void onStateChange(AgentLifecycle previousState,
                           AgentLifecycle newState)
        Called when the agent's state changes. Override to implement custom state change reactions.
        Parameters:
        previousState - the previous lifecycle state
        newState - the new lifecycle state

      • isHealthy

        default boolean isHealthy()
        Called periodically (if the agent context supports it) for health checks. Override to implement custom health reporting.
        Returns:
        true if the agent is healthy, false otherwise

      • log

        default void log(String level,
                 String message)
        Creates a structured log message with agent context.

      • logInfo

        default void logInfo(String message)
        Logs an info message.

      • logWarn

        default void logWarn(String message)
        Logs a warning message.

      • logError

        default void logError(String message)
        Logs an error message.

      • logError

        default void logError(String message,
                      Throwable error)
        Logs an error with exception.
